name: My First Car
description:
Kids love pretending to drive a car. My First Car simulates the driving experience with real sounds.

The car sound is activated when you move the iPhone/iPad around the room. It also uses the camera so you can see where you are going.

The police car includes a siren sound!

This app gets your kids "MOVING" to make the car sounds work.
